text: Marie-Fleur "Fleur" Agema (born 16 September 1976 in Purmerend) is a Dutch politician of the Party for Freedom (PVV). She has been a member of the Second Chamber since 2006 (with an interruption in 2015). From 2003 to 2007 she was a member of the Provincial States of North Holland for the Pim Fortuyn List (LPF) and the Agema Group. == References == * Bio at Parlement.com Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch provincial politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Party for Freedom politicians Category:People from Purmerend Category:People with multiple sclerosis Category:Pim Fortuyn List politicians Category:Politicians from North Holland
title: Fleur Agema
